Intro Subtitle: Explore the latest and greatest in electric vehicles in India

arr_slides.Heading: Tata Nexon EV
Content: India's best-selling electric car with over 20,000 units sold.
Offers a range of up to 312 km on a single charge.
Comes in three variants: Prime, XZA+, and XZ+ Lux.
Priced between ₹14.99 lakh and ₹17.50 lakh (ex-showroom).
Features a 30.2 kWh lithium-ion battery pack.

arr_slides.Heading: MG ZS EV
Content: A premium electric SUV that offers a stylish and comfortable ride.
Offers a range of up to 461 km on a single charge.
Comes in two variants: Excite and Exclusive.
Priced between ₹22.98 lakh and ₹26.88 lakh (ex-showroom).
Features a 50.3 kWh lithium-ion battery pack.

arr_slides.Heading: Hyundai Kona Electric
Content: A compact and sporty electric SUV that is fun to drive.
Offers a range of up to 452 km on a single charge.
Comes in two variants: Premium and Platinum.
Priced between ₹23.99 lakh and ₹29.99 lakh (ex-showroom).
Features a 39.2 kWh lithium-ion battery pack.

arr_slides.Heading: Kia EV6
Content: A futuristic electric crossover that is packed with features.
Offers a range of up to 528 km on a single charge.
Comes in two variants: GT-Line and GT-Line AWD.
Priced between ₹59.95 lakh and ₹64.95 lakh (ex-showroom).
Features a 77.4 kWh lithium-ion battery pack.

arr_slides.Heading: BMW iX
Content: A luxurious and technologically advanced electric SUV.
Offers a range of up to 425 km on a single charge.
Comes in two variants: xDrive40 and xDrive50.
Priced between ₹1.16 crore and ₹1.56 crore (ex-showroom).
Features a 111.5 kWh lithium-ion battery pack.

arr_slides.Heading: Mercedes-Benz EQS
Content: A sophisticated and stylish electric sedan.
Offers a range of up to 857 km on a single charge.
Comes in two variants: EQS 450+ and EQS 580.
Priced between ₹1.55 crore and ₹1.95 crore (ex-showroom).
Features a 107.8 kWh lithium-ion battery pack.

arr_slides.Heading: Tesla Model S Plaid
Content: The world's fastest production electric car.
Offers a range of up to 628 km on a single charge.
Comes in two variants: Plaid and Plaid+.
Priced between ₹2.5 crore and ₹3 crore (ex-showroom).
Features a 100 kWh lithium-ion battery pack.

arr_slides.Heading: Audi e-tron GT
Content: A sporty and elegant electric grand tourer.
Offers a range of up to 488 km on a single charge.
Comes in two variants: e-tron GT quattro and RS e-tron GT.
Priced between ₹1.79 crore and ₹2.05 crore (ex-showroom).
Features a 93 kWh lithium-ion battery pack.

arr_slides.Heading: Porsche Taycan
Content: A high-performance electric sports car.
Offers a range of up to 484 km on a single charge.
Comes in four variants: Taycan, Taycan 4S, Taycan Turbo, and Taycan Turbo S.
Priced between ₹1.5 crore and ₹2.5 crore (ex-showroom).
Features a 93 kWh lithium-ion battery pack.

arr_slides.Heading: Lucid Air Dream Edition
Content: The world's longest-range electric car.
Offers a range of up to 836 km on a single charge.
Comes in two variants: Dream Edition P and Dream Edition R.
Priced between ₹2 crore and ₹2.5 crore (ex-showroom).
Features a 113 kWh lithium-ion battery pack.
